title: Re: Legalization of Drugs
content:
Now this is a stupid question.

Which drugs exactly? Party pills of crack cocaine? They are the same in your poll. All one can sumise is that this is a poll to consider the complete and total legalization of all drugs in a country.

Now if this were more specific, Marajuana perhaps, or P, ecstasy, morphine, etc. then a more productive sample of opinions might be gleaned from this poll.

In general the legalization of a drug shold take count of three points:

1.) Harm: Does the drug cause harm [most do] and if so how much? Is the pleasure gained worth the harm taken? [This is an issue for society as well since everyone must live with the consequences of the drug use.]

2.) How effectively will legalization minimize this harm? Will legalization actually decrease the cases of overdose, gang warfare, etc? Or will they increase?

3.) Will people accept the change?

On this note, yes I would prefer the abolishment of booze and smokes, they cause untold harm. However, point #3 means that this will never happen [well... maybe with ciggies.]
